Injured on 4/25/2010 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for full season...

Injured on 4/29/2014 with a Hyper Extended Elbow, out for one week...
Injured on 5/17/2014 with a Blister On Finger, out for 6 days...
Injured on 5/19/2015 with a Pulled Bicep Muscle, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 8/22/2015 with a Bone Chips Shoulder, out for 5 weeks...
Injured on 6/25/2016 with a Strained Back Muscle, out for one week...
Injured on 7/2/2016 with a Ruptured Bicep Tendon, out for 5 weeks...
Traded from New York (A) to Milwaukee on 7/7/2018 (Going to MIL: DH T. Snider, P J. Taillon, P C. Tillman. Going to NYA: 2B W. Rollins, CF L. Martin)...
Earned first career win on 7/28/2018...
Traded from Milwaukee to Chicago (A) on 4/1/2019 (Going to CHA: C D. Hoke, P J. Taillon. Going to MIL: CF M. Szczur)...
Released by Chicago (A) on 6/12/2021...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 6/12/2021 to a 1-year deal worth $350,000 per year...
